item.description:
Hello Everyone.  With Thanksgiving comming Thursday, some of us may not ave a place to go.  NHCer John has offered up the following for those looking for company!  See his message below.  Happy Thanksgiving!  (-AJ-)

Hi gang, I am hosting a Thanksgiving dinner this Thurs. for those who may be out of town or still be in the process of learning how to sit down with their families without a hypertensive crisis. You don't need to bring anything besides a bottle of wine to share, unless you feel otherwise inclined. However, if there are more than eight people, we may need to turn the event into a buffet style dinner with people bringing a side dish. I live on 51 Lake Place in New Haven. This is the street right in back of the Yale gym. My unit is 5A. You may call me at 858-344-5383 or simply buzz. We will be meeting at 4pm and beginning dinner at 5pm. Given the vicinity to Yale hot-spots we may want to go for an after dinner cocktail at one of local venues. John
item.how_to_find_us: Contact John at the number/location listed.
item.name: Thanksgiving Orphans
